text: R. Dharmar (60) farm labourer, Koothaloorani, was allegedly murdered in the same locality on Saturday evening over a land dispute, sources said. He was hacked to death near a bus stop. The dispute was between Dharmar and his relative M. Karuppasamy (34). On a complaint lodged by Marimuthu (34), son of the deceased, Eppodhum Vendran police filed. Karuppasamy was arrested.
title: Man murdered
